subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The sprinters Tyson Gay and Allyson Felix were named the winners of the Jesse Owens Award as the outstanding United States track and field athletes of 2007. It was the first time Gay has received the award and the second time for the 21-year-old Felix.
